recipes.title: Pancakes with Maple Syrup
recipes.description: Fluffy homemade pancakes served with pure maple syrup and fresh berries.
instructions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
In another bowl, beat the eggs, then add milk, melted butter, and vanilla.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and whisk until just combined.
Heat a non-stick griddle or pan over medium heat.
Pour about 1/4 cup batter for each pancake.
Cook until bubbles form on top, then flip and cook other side until golden.
Serve warm with maple syrup and fresh berries.

recipes.title: Mediterranean Salad
recipes.description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with feta cheese, olives, and homemade dressing.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine salad greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Add kalamata olives and feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and oregano.
Season the dressing with salt and pepper.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Toss gently to combine all ingredients.
Serve immediately while fresh.

recipes.title: Grilled Salmon
recipes.description: Perfectly grilled salmon with lemon herb butter and roasted vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat (around 375°F).
Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, herbs, salt, and pepper.
Brush salmon fillets with the herb mixture.
Place salmon on the grill, skin side down.
Grill for 4-6 minutes per side until cooked through.
Serve with roasted vegetables and lemon slices.
Garnish with additional fresh herbs if desired.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Classic Caesar salad with grilled chicken, crispy croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Season chicken breasts with olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
Wash and chop romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
Toss lettuce with caesar dressing.
Top with sliced chicken, croutons, and parmesan shavings.
Serve with lemon wedges.

recipes.title: Chocolate Lava Cake
recipes.description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Melt chocolate and butter together in a double boiler.
Whisk eggs and sugar until light and fluffy.
Fold melted chocolate mixture into egg mixture.
Sift in flour and cocoa powder, fold gently.
Pour into greased ramekins.
Bake for 12-14 minutes until edges are set but center is soft.
Serve immediately with ice cream and dusted sugar.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Italian risotto with wild mushrooms and freshly grated parmesan.
instructions: Heat stock in a separate pot and keep warm.
Sauté mushrooms in butter until golden, set aside.
Cook onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add rice and toast for 2 minutes.
Add wine and stir until absorbed.
Add hot stock gradually, stirring constantly.
When rice is creamy, add mushrooms and parmesan.
Garnish with herbs and serve hot.

recipes.title: Classic French Toast
recipes.description: Golden-brown French toast dusted with powdered sugar and served with fresh strawberries.
instructions: Whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Dip bread slices in egg mixture, coating both sides.
Heat butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Cook bread 2-3 minutes per side until golden.
Dust with powdered sugar.
Top with fresh strawberries.
Serve with maple syrup.

recipes.title: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.description: Tender beef strips with colorful vegetables in a savory Asian-inspired sauce.
instructions: Marinate beef in soy sauce and ginger for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat.
Stir-fry beef until browned, remove from wok.
Cook vegetables until crisp-tender.
Add beef back to wok.
Stir in sauces and sesame oil.
Serve hot over steamed rice.

recipes.title: Quinoa Buddha Bowl
recipes.description: Nutritious bowl with quinoa, roasted vegetables, avocado, and tahini dressing.
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package instructions.
Roast sweet potatoes and chickpeas with olive oil.
Make dressing by mixing tahini, lemon juice, and water.
Massage kale with olive oil and salt.
Assemble bowls with quinoa base.
Top with roasted vegetables, chickpeas, and avocado.
Drizzle with tahini dressing and sprinkle seeds.

recipes.title: Tuna Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic tuna salad sandwich with lettuce, tomato on toasted whole grain bread.
instructions: Mix tuna, mayonnaise, celery, and onion.
Add relish, salt, and pepper to taste.
Toast bread slices until golden.
Butter the toasted bread.
Layer lettuce and tomato on bread.
Add tuna mixture.
Close sandwich and serve immediately.

recipes.title: Tiramisu
recipes.description: Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.
instructions: Beat egg yolks and sugar until pale.
Add mascarpone and vanilla, mix well.
Whip egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Fold egg whites into mascarpone mixture.
Dip ladyfingers in coffee mixture.
Layer cookies and cream in dish.
Refrigerate for at least 4 hours.
Dust with cocoa before serving.

recipes.title: Greek Moussaka
recipes.description: Layered eggplant casserole with seasoned ground beef and béchamel sauce.
instructions: Salt eggplant slices and let drain for 1 hour.
Make meat sauce with beef, onions, garlic, and tomatoes.
Prepare béchamel sauce with butter, flour, and milk.
Layer grilled eggplant in baking dish.
Add meat sauce layer.
Top with béchamel sauce.
Bake at 350°F for 45 minutes until golden.
Let rest 15 minutes before serving.
